References

Süsstrunk cone response matrix

  • Sabine Süsstrunk. Computing Chromatic Adaptation PhD thesis, 2005, page 104.

Sharpened linear cone response matrix optimized for white-point independence, gamut coverage, and hue constancy. Delivers better results than :cat02 in most cases. Added for experimental purposes.

Munsell spectra (matt)

Munsell colors matt (spectrofotometer measured)

The reflectance spectra of 1269 matt Munsell color chips.
Measuring equipment: Perkin-Elmer lambda 9 UV/VIS/NIR spectrofotometer.
Wavelength interval: 380 nm - 800 nm.
Wavelength resolution: 1 nm.

Measurer: Jouni Hiltunen
  • Further information: Jouni.Hiltunen@joensuu.fi and haanpalo@lut.fi
  • Munsell Book of Color - Matte Finish Collection (Munsell Color, Baltimore, Md., 1976).

CIE Daylight Series generator

  • D. R. W. Hunt. “Measuring Colour”, third edition, Appendix 5.2, CIE Standard Illuminants.

CIE Standard Illuminant A

  • Dr. H. W. G. Hunt, “Measuring Colour”, third edition. Appendix 5, “Relative spectral power distributions of illuminants”

The relative spectral power distribution is equal to a Planckian spectrum at T ≊ 2856 K, which is also its CCT.

CCT according to the International Practical Temperature Scale from 1968.

CIE Standard Illuminants B and C

  • R. G. W. Hunt. “Measuring Colour”, third edition. Chapter 4.1:“Standard Illuminants B and C”

How the CIE Standard Illuminant C is produced:

Standard Source A is combined with a filter made of two 1 cm thick layers, containing two solutions, C₁ and C₂. The solutions are contained in a double cell that is made of a colorless optical glass.

Solution C₁:

  • 3.412 g copper sulphate ($CuSO_4·5H_2O$)
  • 3.412 g mannite [$C_6H_8(OH)_6$]
  • 30.0 ml pyridine ($C_5H_5N$)
  • 1000.0 ml distilled water

Solution C₂:

  • 30.58 g cobalt ammonium sulphate [$CoSO_4·(NH_4)_2SO_4·6H_2O$]
  • 22.52 g copper sulphate ($CuSO_4·5H_2O$)
  • 10.0 ml sulphuric acid (density 1.835 g/ml)
  • 1000.0 ml distilled water
